Package gobblin.data.management.copy.hive

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HivePartitionExtendedFilter
    The IMetaStoreClient provides `listPartitionsByFilter` method which contains a String-type filter parameter.
    HivePartitionExtendedFilterFactory
    A factory for HivePartitionExtendedFilter instances.
    PartitionFilterGenerator
    Generates a partition filter dynamically.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HiveCopyEntityHelper
    Creates CopyEntitys for copying a Hive table.
    HiveCopyEntityHelper.DiffPathSet
    A container for the differences between desired and existing files.
    HiveCopyEntityHelper.Stages  
    HiveDataset
    Hive dataset implementing CopyableDataset.
    HiveDatasetFinder
    Finds HiveDatasets.
    HiveDatasetFinder.DbAndTable  
    HiveFileSet
    A FileSet for Hive datasets.
    HiveLocationDescriptor
    Contains data for a Hive location as well as additional data if HiveLocationDescriptor.HIVE_DATASET_COPY_ADDITIONAL_PATHS_RECURSIVELY_ENABLED set to true.
    HivePartitionFileSet
    A HiveFileSet for Hive partitions.
    HivePartitionsDeregisterFileSet
    A HiveFileSet for deregistering partitions in the target.
    HiveTargetPathHelper  
    HiveUtils
    Utilities for org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql classes.
    PathBasedHivePartitionFilterFactory
    A path based specific filter factory for generation of PathBasedPartitionFilter
    PathBasedPartitionFilter
    One simple implementation for HivePartitionExtendedFilter, which looked at each partition's path and decide if a partition should be kept or not.
    UnpartitionedTableFileSet
    A HiveFileSet that generates CopyEntitys for an unpartitioned Hive table.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HiveCopyEntityHelper.DeregisterFileDeleteMethod  
    HiveCopyEntityHelper.ExistingEntityPolicy
    Defines what should be done for partitions that exist in the target but are not compatible with the source.
    HiveCopyEntityHelper.UnmanagedDataPolicy
    Defines what should be done for data that is not managed by the existing target table / partition.
    HiveLocationDescriptor.PathFindingMethod  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HiveTableLocationNotMatchException
    Denotes that the desired target table location in Hive does not match the existing target table location
